verbs.description: U.S. officials [V: are] preparing to move up to 1,000 immigration detainees to a federal prison in Victorville as part of a Trump administration plan to expand the use of detention amid its crackdown on immigrants in the country illegally .

[ARG0: U.S. officials] are [V: preparing] [ARG2: to move up to 1,000 immigration detainees to a federal prison in Victorville as part of a Trump administration plan to expand the use of detention amid its crackdown on immigrants in the country illegally] .

[ARG0: U.S. officials] are preparing to [V: move] [ARG1: up to 1,000 immigration detainees] [ARG2: to a federal prison in Victorville] as part of a Trump administration plan to expand the use of detention amid its crackdown on immigrants in the country illegally .

U.S. officials are preparing to move up to 1,000 immigration detainees to a federal prison in Victorville as part of a Trump administration plan to [V: expand] [ARG1: the use of detention] [ARGM-LOC: amid its crackdown on immigrants in the country illegally] .
